title: Joshua Byrd
description: A really simple micro feed of updates.

items.content_text: Made some changes to make the Timeline page a bit more JAMSTACKy instead of relying on server-side functions. Feels a bit snappier. https://github.com/phocks/phocks.vercel.app
Right, links *should* link up now. Here, follow me on Twitter or whatever https://twitter.com/phocks
Hmm I might need to work out how to process URLs so I can click Ash's links :)
Building a timeline to view both mine and Ash's updates.
Having lunch with Ash!!
It's a bit windy in the city today.
On the train home, thinking about a few things.
Cooking with vegetables is a magical experience. I'm trying to find more magic in existence lately. Will see where this leads.
Slightly hungover. Worth it. Our team won an award last night.
Don't wanna forget about this little micro blog. It's difficult though without the constant stream of notifications that other apps like Twitter etc use to get you hooked.
Trying to get into the Elm programming language. I like it but yeah I dunno.
Damn this Squid Game is getting intense.
The most surprising thing I'm enjoying about this micro blogging thing is the ability to edit posts. Twitter is dead to me (not really).
Making hummus. Can't wait to eat it!
Had a lovely dinner out on the back deck. It's finally warm enough!
Soaking some chickpeas. Gonna make more hummus tomorrow.
It's getting pretty warm today. Summer is rolling around.
Time to make a coffee! Mmmmmm coffee.
Making a tea. Getting ready to start a new week. Forgot to take the public holiday off work :(
Yes it works!! Alright, now I can update any time I want, from anywhere. Gonna go watch SNL. Later.
Built out the app for my phone. Let's see if this works...
Updating status via a React Native app. Let's see if it works ...
Right! I seem to be getting somewhere. The plan is to make a React Native app on my phone. Then it will use the GitHub API to add new posts.
Gotta see if I can edit and commit a JSON file on GitHub in NodeJS so I can automate posts on here.
Playing some Battletech. Vada is watching Frozen.
OK! Almost ready for a minimal viable product. Maybe!
Attempting to make some kind of front-end for this thing...
Just setting up my bird feed
